channel.title: The Olin Ezra Show
channel.itunes:summary: Listen to Olin Ezra, Magnanomus, Danni Katastrophe and Big Baby P interview some of the best Detroit bands, national acts, local flavor and culture, revolutionary news and more! The Olin Ezra Show has been called "The Future of Detroit Talk Radio"
channel.itunes:author: The Olin Ezra Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Olin Ezra Show: Detroit's Underground Talk Revolution
channel.itunes:keywords: the olin ezra show, detroit podcast, detroit radio, band interviews, interviews, news

item.title: Episode 116 – Pre Show Post!
item.dc:creator: Olin Ezra
item.description: EPISODE 116 HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED TO SUNDAY JANUARY 16 DUE TO TECHNICAL ISSUES WITH OUR INTERNET HOST I decided, from this point forward, that a little info on the website about tonight’s show is never a bad thing. Tonight we feature two great bands, Ekoostik Hookah and The Infatuations. Not only that we have Dennis [...]
item.content:encoded:
Ekoostik Hookah

EPISODE 116 HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED TO SUNDAY JANUARY 16 DUE TO TECHNICAL ISSUES WITH OUR INTERNET HOST

I decided, from this point forward, that a little info on the website about tonight’s show is never a bad thing. Tonight we feature two great bands, Ekoostik Hookah and The Infatuations. Not only that we have Dennis Farrell from The Fantasy Sideline Show.com as well as more Big Baby P. This is going to be a great episode, and hopefully the next few weeks go by quick while we finish the new studio!

Don’t forget to LISTEN LIVE SUNDAY JANUARY 9th at 8:00PM EST

Log in to TAPDETROIT.COM CHAT

The Infatuations

Call in LIVE 313-449-8500

Check out more Ekoostik Hookah Here

Check out The Infatuations on iTunes

Check out The Fantasy Sideline Show.com


Share!
More »

item.title: Episode #113 – Bob Dancer, Jet’s Pizza and Even More Black Irish
item.dc:creator: zaldor
item.description: The real new years resolution is to get caught up with all the podcasts. This episode was recorded in Mid-December, and features the unstoppable guest Bob Dancer. Everything possible is covered in this episode. No catchy intro paragraph, no bullshit, just great content. Some of the material in this episode… Special Guest Bob Dancer from [...]
item.content:encoded:
The real new years resolution is to get caught up with all the podcasts. This episode was recorded in Mid-December, and features the unstoppable guest Bob Dancer. Everything possible is covered in this episode. No catchy intro paragraph, no bullshit, just great content. Some of the material in this episode…

  • Special Guest Bob Dancer from Lixx
  • Black Irish Track, Lixx Track
  • Bob Dancer amazing solo outro!
  • A Girl on the Moon
  • National Hug a Ginger Day
  • Mitch Rider likes Lixx
  • WCSX Deep Tracks
  • Bobs stage insanity
  • Insight and knowledge Bob Dancer style…
  • Frosty the Hate Man
  • Man decapitated by a Chicken Machine
  • All this and more decapitations per podcast that anyone else

Click HERE to Download Episode 113 of The Olin Ezra Show: Bob Dancer, Jet’s Pizza and Even More Black Irish

    Share!
    More »

item.title: Episode #112 – Jagoff and Cody Stagefright!
item.dc:creator: zaldor
item.category: it takes a major label to hold us back
item.description: Congratulations on your epic endurance. It seems we have been waiting many weeks for these next two episodes. If you don’t know, we are building a new studio for not only the show but for TapDetroit.com. More Info will be posted as it’s ready… So here’s a 1 hour and 40 minute episode. Tangy… Exclusive [...]
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations on your epic endurance. It seems we have been waiting many weeks for these next two episodes. If you don’t know, we are building a new studio for not only the show but for TapDetroit.com. More Info will be posted as it’s ready… So here’s a 1 hour and 40 minute episode. Tangy…

  • Exclusive in-studio interview with Cody Stagefright
  • Exclusive phone-in with Sir Real from JagOff
  • Exclusive Tracks from Cody Stagefright and JagOff
  • Big Baby Santa?
  • Info about the now past Olin Ezra Show Twisted X-Mas
  • Canadian Fry Gravy
  • Dilan threatens to stop the show because of intense post-show production
  • Shout out to Terry from RSP for his last show!
  • New security measures aim for your anus
  • Google, Google…
  • DIY or DIE
  • Info on the JagOff release “It Takes A Major Label to Hold Us Back”
  • JagOff on the Esoteric Agenda
  • Chuck D and Media Conglomeration
  • Chicago Promoters Ordinance
  • Jim’s Surprise
  • Tons of calls and outreach to Cody Stagefright
  • Pat calls in and has something for Danni in his Sack.
  • Pat also digs on Volcano in that way
  • Tramplings at Walmart
  • All this and even more liquid enjoyment, with less calories, than you can enjoy

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD EPISODE 112 of The Olin Ezra Show: JagOff and Cody Stagefright

Share!
More »
item.itunes:keywords: cody stagefright,detroit podcast,it takes a major label to hold us back,jagoff,publishing,volcano

item.title: Episode #111 – Special guest Chuck Alkazian
item.dc:creator: zaldor
item.description: This episode features special guest co-host Local Detroit Superproducer Chuck Alkazian! Call in and say Chuck, Danni, and your favorite word! Twisted Christmas 2 coming up on December 18th @ The Hayloft! This week’s beer of the week is: Taint Juice? Chuck’s loving the freedom of internet radio! Oh wait, the beer of the week is [...]
item.content:encoded:
This episode features special guest co-host Local Detroit Superproducer Chuck Alkazian!

  • Call in and say Chuck, Danni, and your favorite word!
  • Twisted Christmas 2 coming up on December 18th @ The Hayloft!
  • This week’s beer of the week is: Taint Juice?
  • Chuck’s loving the freedom of internet radio!
  • Oh wait, the beer of the week is Kool-aid and cheap vodka!
  • Where is Phil the Intern and Dave from Static Noise??
  • Privacy and Facebook – what you need to know!
  • The government keeps taking and taking things from us, and we do nothing about it! Facebook is only the beginning!!!
  • Chuck loves magic Mormon underwear!
  • Track from BobaFlex
  • New Track from Trust Company
Share!
More »
item.itunes:subtitle: This episode features special guest co-host Local Detroit Superproducer Chuck Alkazian! Call in and say Chuck, Danni, and your favorite word! Twisted Christmas 2 coming up on December 18th @ The Hayloft!
item.itunes:summary:
This episode features special guest co-host Local Detroit Superproducer Chuck Alkazian (http://www.chuckalkazian.com/)!
(http://www.theolinezrashow.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/12/chuck-300x213.jpg)
* Call in and say Chuck, Danni, and your favorite word! * Twisted Christmas 2 coming up on December 18th @ The Hayloft! * This week's beer of the week is: Taint Juice? * Chuck's loving the freedom of internet radio! * Oh wait, the beer of the week is Kool-aid and cheap vodka! * Where is Phil the Intern and Dave from Static Noise?? * Privacy and Facebook - what you need to know! * The government keeps taking and taking things from us, and we do nothing about it! Facebook is only the beginning!!! * Chuck loves magic Mormon underwear! * Track from BobaFlex (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobaflex) * New Track from Trust Company (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trust_Company_(band))
item.itunes:author: The Olin Ezra Show

item.title: Twisted X-Mas 2: Tickets on sale now!
item.dc:creator: Olin Ezra
item.description: This December 18th, The Hayloft: 140 N. Mainstreet Mt. Clemens MI Featuring: The Pilz The Fake Take Konniption Fit Potty Mouth Sissys ShockWave and Ajax Special Lance Kellar Studios Give-Away: Ladies come dressed up as Santas Sexiest Elf and win a $100 Gift card to Lance Kellar Studios. Contest will be judged by partners of [...]
item.content:encoded:
This December 18th,

The Hayloft:
140 N. Mainstreet Mt. Clemens MI

Featuring:
The Pilz
The Fake Take
Konniption Fit
Potty Mouth Sissys
ShockWave
and Ajax

Special Lance Kellar Studios Give-Away: Ladies come dressed up as Santas Sexiest Elf and win a $100 Gift card to Lance Kellar Studios. Contest will be judged by partners of the show InkAddict.com

Special Ink-Addict X-Mas Merch
Motor City Nephew X-Mas Merch

And 3 more surprises that you will only know about if you are there at this show. This will mortify, entertain and thoroughly kick the ass of anyone coming through the door. That’s a good thing. Buy online here or talk to any of the bands involved for your tickets! They are moving fast.



Share!
More »

item.title: Episode 110 – The Product
item.dc:creator: zaldor
item.description: New number to call in LIVE: 313-449-8500 How was the B-Dab record release party go? They’re still trying to remember… No real beer of the week, but Ezra Brooks Whiskey makes a great replacement Ever drink stuff that turns your tongue black?? Smartphone application in development that will tell you if you have any STDS! [...]
item.content:encoded:
• New number to call in LIVE: 313-449-8500
  • How was the B-Dab record release party go?  They’re still trying to remember…
  • No real beer of the week, but Ezra Brooks Whiskey makes a great replacement
  • Ever drink stuff that turns your tongue black??
  • Smartphone application in development that will tell you if you have any STDS!
  • Zaldor hiding in the bushes?? Where is Zaldor anyways?
  • Word of the week: Roofie
  • Taint Stain of the week: Naked attacker/thief had mouse cord in his ass!
  • Interview with Rich from The Product
  • Do you shit out rose petals?
  • Nutritionist loses 27lbs on twinkie diet
  • Randy from ODayin calls in the the show to get shit off his mind
  • Guess Rikki Roxx is still trying to remember the B-dab release party too
  • Chemtrails
  • Rikki Roxx calls in the talk about what happened to him after the B-dab release show, he was at the Blue Water Bridge when he realized he was going the wrong way!
  • Suddenly Holly joins the conversation to help explain what happened at the B-dab show
  • Matt from Dryvel calls in to the show

Here’s the video that The Product’s song, “Make your Move” is featured in:

Share!
More »
item.itunes:keywords: b-dab,computer mouse,danni,detroit music,detroit rock,ezra brooks,joe,mouse cord,olin ezra,rose petals,shit,smartphone
item.itunes:subtitle: New number to call in LIVE: 313-449-8500 How was the B-Dab record release party go? They're still trying to remember... ;) No real beer of the week, but Ezra Brooks Whiskey makes a great replacement Ever drink stuff that turns your tongue black??
item.itunes:summary:
* New number to call in LIVE: 313-449-8500 * How was the B-Dab record release party go? They're still trying to remember... ;) * No real beer of the week, but Ezra Brooks Whiskey (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ezra_Brooks_Kentucky_Bourbon_Whiskey) makes a great replacement * Ever drink stuff that turns your tongue black?? * Smartphone application in development that will tell you if you have any STDS! (http://www.dailytech.com/Researchers+Help+Smartphone+Users+Test+Themselves+for+STDs/article20115.htm) * Zaldor hiding in the bushes?? Where is Zaldor anyways? * Word of the week: Roofie * Taint Stain of the week: Naked attacker/thief had mouse cord in his ass! (http://www.dailytelegraph.com.au/news/breaking-news/naked-attacker-had-mouse-up-his-bum-in-south-carolina/story-e6freuyi-1225951754798) * Interview with Rich from The Product (http://www.myspace.com/productrock) * Do you shit out rose petals? * Nutritionist loses 27lbs on twinkie diet (http://www.cnn.com/2010/HEALTH/11/08/twinkie.diet.professor/index.html) * Randy from ODayin (http://www.myspace.com/odayinmusic) calls in the the show to get shit off his mind * Guess Rikki Roxx is still trying to remember the B-dab release party too * Chemtrails (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemtrail_conspiracy_theory) * Rikki Roxx calls in the talk about what happened to him after the B-dab (http://www.b-dab.com) release show, he was at the Blue Water Bridge (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Water_Bridge) when he realized he was going the wrong way! * Suddenly Holly joins the conversation to help explain what happened at the B-dab (http://www.b-dab.com) show * Matt from Dryvel (http://www.myspace.com/dryvel) calls in to the show
Here's the video that The Product's song, "Make your Move" is featured in:
item.itunes:author: The Olin Ezra Show
